name: Melbourne Parkview Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Spent one night there for a show in Melbourne. Staff courteous and helpful, Car park was a bit tight and parking spaces narrow and not many empty but did get one. The room we stayed in was fantastic, spotless, spacious and with a great view of the cricket ground which due to my schedule I was unable to take advantage of my late checkout to sit in the armchair and watch.
reviews.title: Nice Place!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Getting a taxi into the city that evening was a bit more difficult than it should've been and the staff member wasn't much help
reviews.title: LATE CHECK-OUT IS FAB!!!!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: The bed was one of the most comfortable I've ever slept in.
reviews.title: Will come back

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast was also very good with a huge varietey and reasonably hot and although I had to buy a 'proper' coffee it was delicious. Overall a wonderful place to stay
reviews.title: Great every time

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: the ro..om we had was lovely. we had a view of a park and the melb skyline. there was everything in the room you would need and the layout was great. I forgot to pack socks for my hubby and when I had a look at their 'motel shopping' list, low and behold you could purchase socks!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! when I told my hubby he thought I was joking but no went to reception and purchased some bond socks for only $8. there were other things on the list that would be very handy if you have forgotten something. all the staff were exceptionally friendly and helpful. the tram stop is a very short stroll away so it was very easy going into the cbd and st. Kilda which we did. will definitely stay here again when going to melb.!!!!!!!!!!! forgot to mention we had a 1.00pm check-out which was brilliant after a great night b4!!!!
reviews.title: Excellent facilities

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Just spent two night at the Parkview and was extreamly happy. We arrived early around a 11 am after an early flight from Sydney. Naturally our rooms were not ready at that time, said we would go for a coffee and left our number with reception. They contacted us as soon as one room was ready, which wasn't too long after our arrival. Everything was great in the hotel from reception to check out. The reception staff were extremely helpful. Great view of the Melbourne skyline from our rooms on the fifth floor. No noise from traffic or nearby trams, double glazing. We love fresh air so we opened the window, a big plus for us, which did allow a little noise, but not enough to keep us awake. Breakfast buffet was fine, they did run low on Sunday morning but it was quickly replenished. Not much in the way of restaurants within walking distance, there are a couple of cafes opposite which were fine for light meals.
reviews.title: Would stay again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Trams are outside and it is only a short ride into the CBD or St. Kilda.
reviews.title: Very Friendly / Helpful Staff, credit to the facility

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Very enjoyable stay, wonderful helpful staff, situated only a brief tram ride from the city after purchasing the MIKI card from reception.
reviews.title: Would stay again.......

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: Everything was clean, crisp and like new, working in the Facilities Management Industry I tend to take much more notice of the smaller things than most people and must say I was very impressed.
reviews.title: Short but enjoyable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very tight parking is the only let down, but in saying that I do drive one of the largest 4wds available in this country and did manage to get into the car park and into a space ( after removing all luggage before parking)
reviews.title: CAR PARKING

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a great location mid way between the city centre and St Kilda beaches. Trams run all the time in both directions so you are not more than 5-6 minutes from either. You are also walking distance to Pahran and Greville St shopping districts.
reviews.title: Nice Stay, helpful staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: The staff very really helpful and a great asset to the hotel. They were friendly and took care of all our requests, including moving room without a problem.
reviews.title: Welcoming

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: The rooms were big, very clean and comfortable.
reviews.title: Great location, great service.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Free Wifi was excellent.
reviews.title: Always a great stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Would stay here again.
reviews.title: Greta place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Melbourne parkview was exactly what we were looking for and we got a great deal through the postcards show. Bed was super comfy, shower was great. We enjoyed the spa and breakfast. Would definitely stay again.
reviews.title: Great stay...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled solo
reviews.text: Best hotel bed every! Was like sleeping on a cloud, so nice and soft.
reviews.title: Would stay again.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Friendly staff.
reviews.title: Great experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great location for Alfred hospital visits.
reviews.title: Honesty, Integrity and Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013
reviews.text: Better light in the bathroom (for doing makeup) would be nice but was a better one near the wardrobe.
reviews.title: Best accommodation packages in melbourne!

description: ** AS OF JULY 1 2013, WE ARE NOW OFFERING FREE WIFI THROUGHOUT OUR HOTEL (IN ROOM AND IN ALL PUBLIC AREAS)Just a stone’s throw away from the CBD, the Melbourne Parkview Hotel is located along St Kilda Road’s famous tree lined boulevard on Melbourne’s city fringe. Our 206 spacious, warm and inviting rooms provide guests with a separate dressing and wardrobe area, well-appointed bathroom with large walk in shower, individually controlled air-conditioners, work desk and plenty of fresh air from one thing you won't find in most other hotels, windows that open.Other room features include mini-bar, tea/coffee facilities, in-room safe, bathrobes, pillow menu, double glazed windows, high speed wireless broadband internet access, High Definition LCD TV with Foxtel Cable Television and a Media Hub allowing direct TV connection for your media device.Hotel facilities include 24hr reception, 24hr room service, dedicated conference floor, gym, concierge, guest laundry and dry cleaning service, business center, complimentary newspapers, on-site secure parking and complimentary wireless internet in public areas. Relax and indulge whilst taking in the views of Melbourne and surrounds from our indoor roof top spa & sauna.Breakfast, lunch and dinner can be enjoyed in Woods Cafe, Bar & Restaurant, with its outdoor terrace, café, restaurant, and bar.Many of Melbourne’s tourist attractions are only a short tram ride away including the iconic Federation Square, Chapel Street, Shrine of Remembrance, Royal Botanic Gardens, MCG and Etihad Stadium. The Melbourne Parkview Hotel is in the perfect location to enjoy the best of Melbourne.
